mapper.insert: insert into cart (num, gCode, gCategory, gName, gPrice, gImage, gAmount, userid, username, post, addr1, addr2, phone, email1, email2) values (listInfo_seq.nextval ,#{gCode},#{gCategory},#{gName},#{gPrice},#{gImage},#{gAmount},#{userid}, #{username},#{post},#{addr1},#{addr2},#{phone},#{email1},#{email2})
mapper.select: select num, gCode, gCategory, gName, gPrice, gImage, gAmount, userid, username, post, addr1, addr2, phone, email1, email2 from cart where userid = #{userid}
